content.rendered:
Experience:

  • 5 years of experience in IT and Three or more years’ experience Participating in Security audits and inspections in DoD/Fedreal environment
  • Cybersecurity certification such as CISSP or CEH
  • Expertise in RMF, security controls and vulnerability management.
  • Proficiency with eMASS, ACAS, STIG Viewer, Cloud Technologies
  • Experience using tools like eMASS, STIG Viewer, DISA STIGs, and ACAS

Responsibilities

  • Managing diverse environments (on-prem, cloud, hybrid), addressing rapidly evolving threats, and adhere to stringent timelines for authorization processes.

Conduct comprehensive cybersecurity system assessments to validate the readiness and compliance of DoD enclaves, systems, and applications with RMF standards and DoD policies

Education Requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT-related field preferred)
